snippet: The trial of Louis Pinto Jr. and Kevin Gilkes escalated tensions between the city and the correction officers’ union.
abstract: Rikers Island guards Louis Pinto Jr and Kevin Gilkes, accused of assaulting a prisoner and covering up their actions in 2011, are found not guilty on all charges; verdict follows , lengthy trial that escalated tensions between New York City and union representing Department of Correction officers.
lead_paragraph: The trial of Louis Pinto Jr. and Kevin Gilkes escalated tensions between the city and the correction officers’ union.

headline.main: Rikers Island Guards Are Found Not Guilty in Prisoner Assault Case
headline.print_headline: Rikers Island Guards Are Found Not Guilty in Prisoner Assault Case
